PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-06732008-04-10,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisReappointment of RITA A. P. CUGINI of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; designate RITA A. P. CUGINI for the Ontario region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of that Act; and determine that RITA A. P. CUGINI shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Ontario regional Office, effective April 11, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
